channel.title: Difference
channel.description:
Hey, I don't know if this is the right place or not, but I'm gunna ask it here anyway since I never asked a question like this before.
How much more stable is Hyperion than Shard. Hyperion is confusing and I CBF to learn how to code it unless someone teaches me... I still don't know about Shard but I think it might be easier. :P
